title: Multimedia Utilization Project Design for Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in science and proficiency in basic digital tools
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment for science field practitioners to effectively integrate multimedia tools in educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can selectively apply multimedia elements (images, videos, simulations) suitable for science education content.
Learners can develop one educational module using VR/simulation tools through a project-based approach.
Learners can analyze the impact of multimedia elements on learners' cognitive processes and incorporate findings into instructional design.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
